cast.overview: The rebellious Thracian Spartacus, born and raised a slave, is sold to Gladiator trainer Batiatus. After weeks of being trained to kill for the arena, Spartacus turns on his owners and leads the other slaves in rebellion. As the rebels move from town to town, their numbers swell as escaped slaves join their ranks. Under the leadership of Spartacus, they make their way to southern Italy, where they will cross the sea and return to their homes.
cast.title: Spartacus

crew.original_title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
crew.overview: A group of strangers come across a man dying after a car crash who proceeds to tell them about the $350,000 he buried in California. What follows is the madcap adventures of those strangers as each attempts to claim the prize for himself.
crew.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World

crew.overview: David Huxley is waiting to get a bone he needs for his museum collection. Through a series of strange circumstances, he meets Susan Vance, and the duo have a series of misadventures which include a leopard called Baby.
crew.title: Bringing Up Baby

details.biography: Helen Thurston was an American stuntwoman.  She was born in Oregon and died on April 23, 1979 in Costa Mesa, California.
details.name: Helen Thurston
